content: Yes, McAfee's antivirus software is compatible with Mac computers. McAfee offers a version of its antivirus software specifically designed for Mac operating systems, including macOS 10.15 (Catalina), macOS 10.14 (Mojave), and macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) or later. The software offers real-time protection against malware, viruses, spyware, and other cyber threats, as well as features such as anti-phishing and anti-spam protection, identity theft protection, and a firewall. The software can be easily downloaded and installed on Mac computers, and it provides regular updates to ensure the system is protected against the latest threats.
